CatDescriptText: Mr. William Horton, chauffeur, Fifth Ward, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 22, 1961, pg. 7 with question: "Do you believe Negroes in Pittsburgh are as militant about Civil Rights like others of their race display in other Metropolitan areas in the USA? Why?"  Answer reads: "Yes..."
TitMainTitle: Two frames: Cracked sidewalk or street; Portrait of William Horton wearing dark hat, moustache, and crisscross patterned short sleeved shirt with rolled sleeves, standing with hands on hips on street
